sentences.en: A sprayer hooked to a tractor can spray five gallons onto ten acres.
sentences.cn: 用拖拉机牵引的喷雾器可以将5加仑药水喷洒在10英亩田地上。

sentences.en: He has a tractor.
sentences.cn: 他有一台拖拉机.

sentences.en: He learnt tractor maintenance.
sentences.cn: 他学会了拖拉机维修.

sentences.en: In addition to the tractor, we have acquired a new rice transplanter.
sentences.cn: 除了拖拉机, 我们又添了一台插秧机.

sentences.en: Iron - ox is another name for tractor.
sentences.cn: 铁牛是拖拉机的别名.

sentences.en: Iron-ox is another name for tractor.
sentences.cn: 铁牛是拖拉机的别名。

sentences.en: It can take place anywhere, whether in the shower or in the job, whether in a kitchen or on a tractor.
sentences.cn: 它可以在任何场合下进行，不论是在淋浴时还是在工作时，不论是在厨房里还是在拖拉机上。

sentences.en: My tractor operates on diesel oil.
sentences.cn: 我的那台拖拉机用柴油开动.

sentences.en: Our tractor is out of order.
sentences.cn: 我们的拖拉机坏了.

sentences.en: Paul hooked his tractor to the car and pulled it to safety.
sentences.cn: 保罗把自己的拖拉机挂在汽车上，然后把它拉到了安全的地方。

sentences.en: The device led them straight to a field littered with clods of earth and shot through with tractor marks.
sentences.cn: 这种设备可以直接把他们引向一片满是土块和拖拉机痕迹的田地。

sentences.en: The farm employed a tractor driver and two general labourers.
sentences.cn: 农场雇用了一名拖拉机手和两名杂工。

sentences.en: The tractor churn ed up the soil.
sentences.cn: 拖拉机翻起土坡.

sentences.en: The tractor hauled the fertilizer away.
sentences.cn: 拖拉机把肥料拉走了.

sentences.en: The tractor hauled the load away.
sentences.cn: 拖拉机将重物拖走.

sentences.en: The tractor is bogged down in the mud.
sentences.cn: 拖拉机陷入了泥沼.

sentences.en: The truck was an 18-wheeler with a white tractor.
sentences.cn: 这辆卡车有18轮，还有一个白色牵引车头。

sentences.en: This kind of tractor is easy to start.
sentences.cn: 这种拖拉机很容易发动.

sentences.en: This kind of walking tractor runs on diesel oil.
sentences.cn: 这种手扶拖拉机靠柴油运转。

sentences.en: You must oil the tractor every day.
sentences.cn: 你必须每天给拖拉机加油.

words.tran_cn: 牵引；[机][车辆] 牵引力

trans.tran_en: a strong vehicle with large wheels, used for pulling farm machinery
